'''Alpha 1.0.0.7''' (also known as '''1.0.0 build 6''') is the sixth and final build version released for [[Pocket Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]], also known as the [[Ender Update]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004166311|title=MCPE Android Beta - 1.0 build 6}}</ref> This is the final alpha released in 2016.

== Fixes ==

'''From release versions before 1.0'''
* {{bug|MCPE-16611}} – Blacksmith generate wrong loot
* {{bug|MCPE-16889}} – Ghasts don't make sounds
* {{bug|MCPE-17379}} – Rabbits spawning too frequently
* {{bug|MCPE-19124}} – Hopper bug
'''From 1.0 development versions'''
* {{bug|MCPE-18246}} – Lingering potions have no sounds
* {{bug|MCPE-18623}} – Endermites now have 'player/hurt' sounds
* {{bug|MCPE-19135}} – Ender charge particles
* Fixed a crash that occurred on some Android devices.</onlyinclude>
